title: february 14: happy v day!
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the origins of Valentine’s Day. She also talks about the recording of an iconic soul tune. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
